biotools.summary: Predict structures of G-protein-coupled receptors (GPCRs) using advanced homology modeling tools: profile-profile alignment, multiple structural templates, and Z coordinate-based filtering of resulting models. Two distinct loop modeling techniques are employed - Modeller and Rosetta - and the BCL::Score (membrane-fitted knowledge-based energy function) is used to score the final ranking list of GPCR models.

bioschemas.name: GPCRM
